title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Park ranger with visitor NPS Photo  Through November 15th, 2015 the visitor center is open daily 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. From November 16th, 2015 through March 14th, 2016 the visitor center is open daily from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. The visitor center is closed on Christmas Day. Park grounds and picnic areas are open daily. The road leading to the Pinnacle Overlook may be closed periodically due to inclement weather including ice, snow, and lightning.
